pt.ua.gboard.basic

Class CharGelem

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.gboard.Gelem
      • pt.ua.gboard.basic.OneColorGelem
        • pt.ua.gboard.basic.StringGelem
          • pt.ua.gboard.basic.CharGelem

  • public class CharGelem
extends StringGelem
    This gelem writes a character in a rectangle of cells.
